name: cloudflare-dyndns
description: A robust TypeScript application that automatically updates Cloudflare DNS records when your public IP address changes. Perfect for maintaining consistent domain names for home servers, WireGuard VPN, self-hosted services, or any system with a dynamic IP address.

scripts.dev: npm run dev:setup && npm run dev:run
scripts.prepare: npm run build && node scripts/make-executable.js && husky install
scripts.release:validate: npm run lint && npm run build && npm test && npm run test:integration
scripts.release:patch: npm version patch && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:major: npm version major && git push && git push --tags

author: Monkey/WHat
